ROOT.GetStationWeatherRealInfo: select S.STATION_ID,W.* from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE S LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO W on W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=S.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE STATION_ID = {0}
ROOT.GetTowerWeatherRealInfo: select S.LINE_ID, S.TOWER_ID, T.ID AS WEATHER_SOURCE_ID, 1 AS ID ,T.CREATETIME,T.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,T.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT, B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b b join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE s on b.ID=s.tower_id join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName ysh_weather_lastrealtime_info t on t.id=s.weather_source_id WHERE LINE_ID = {0}
ROOT.GetStationWeatherForecastInfo: select S.STATION_ID,W.* from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE S LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_FORECAST_INFO W on W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=S.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE STATION_ID = {0} AND CREATETIME = '{1}'
ROOT.GetTowerWeatherForecastInfo: select T.LINE_ID, T.TOWER_ID, 1 AS ID, W.ID AS WEATHER_SOUECE_ID,W.HUMIDITY,W.TEMPERATURE,W.FORE_TIME AS FORECASTTIME,W.WIND_VELOCITY,W.PRESSURE,W.TIMESPAN,W.RAIN,0 AS CLOUD,W.DATE_TIME AS CREATETIME ,W.WIND_DIRECTION, B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b b join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE T on b.ID = T.TOWER_ID join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_weatherstation_h_forecast_2019 W on W.ID=T.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE T.LINE_ID = {0} AND DATE_TIME = '{1}'
ROOT.GetStationWeatherHistoryInfo: select S.STATION_ID,W.* from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE S LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO W on W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=S.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE STATION_ID = {0} AND CREATETIME = '{1}'
ROOT.GetTowerWeatherHistoryInfo: select T.LINE_ID, T.TOWER_ID, W.*, B.LONGITUDE,B.LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b b join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE T on b.ID = T.TOWER_ID join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO W on W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=T.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE LINE_ID = {0} AND CREATETIME = '{1}'
ROOT.GetTowerAcrossInfo: select ID, LINE_ID,LINE_NAME,MIN_TOWER_ID,MAX_TOWER_ID,ACROSS_TYPE,ACROSS_LONGITUDE,ACROSS_LATITUDE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO WHERE LINE_ID = {0}
ROOT.GetPartitionsRealWeatherInfoByLevel: select distinct(C.region), B.*,X,Y,C.level as wLevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DISTRICT C on right(A.id,6)=C.region
ROOT.GetPartitionsForecastWeatherInfoByLevel: select distinct(C.region), B.*,X,Y,C.level as wLevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_FORECAST_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DISTRICT C on right(A.id,6)=C.region WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}' and C.level= '{1}'
ROOT.GetPartitionsHistoryWeatherInfoByLevel: select distinct(C.region), B.*,X,Y,C.level as wLevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DISTRICT C on right(A.id,6)=C.region WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}' and C.level= '{1}'
ROOT.GetPartitionsRealWeatherInfo: select A.ID AS WEATHER_SOURCE_ID,0 AS HUMIDITY, B.TEMPERATURE ,B.WIND_VELOCITY,0 as PRESSURE,B.RAIN,0 AS CLOUD,1 AS ID ,B.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,B.CREATETIME,B.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,A.X AS LATITUDE,A.Y AS LONGITUDE,B.WIND_DIRECTION,CITY,b.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,a.name from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName ysh_weather_lastrealtime_info B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.ID
ROOT.GetPartitionsForecastWeatherInfo_1: select 1 AS ID, B.ID AS WEATHER_SOUECE_ID,B.HUMIDITY,B.TEMPERATURE,B.FORE_TIME AS FORECASTTIME,B.WIND_VELOCITY,B.PRESSURE,B.TIMESPAN,B.RAIN,0 AS CLOUD,B.DATE_TIME AS CREATETIME ,B.WIND_DIRECTION,X,Y,CITY from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_weatherstation_h_forecast_2019 B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.ID WHERE DATE_TIME = '{0}'
ROOT.GetPartitionsForecastWeatherInfo_2: select 1 AS ID, B.ID AS WEATHER_SOUECE_ID,B.HUMIDITY,B.TEMPERATURE,B.WIND_VELOCITY,0 as PRESSURE,1 AS TIMESPAN,B.RAIN,0 AS CLOUD,B.DATE_TIME AS CREATETIME ,B.WIND_DIRECTION,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.OWNER AS REGION,'990100'AS CITY from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_grid_h_weatherforecast_2020 B left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_grid_b A on A.ID=B.ID WHERE DATE_TIME ='{0}'
ROOT.GetPartitionsForecastWeatherInfo:
select *,1 AS ID from
( select distinct B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID, B.HUMIDITY,B.TEMPERATURE,B.WINDSPEED AS WIND_VELOCITY,B.PRESSURE,B.RAIN,0 as CLOUD,B.WIND_DIRECTION,B.forecasttime as createtime,B.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,B.WIND_DIR_RESULT,X AS LATITUDE,Y AS LONGITUDE,CITY,b.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,a.name from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_FORECAST_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE FORECASTTIME = '{0}' and createTIME in (select max(createTIME) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_FORECAST_INFO WHERE FORECASTTIME = '{0}' ))
ROOT.GetPartitionsHistoryWeatherInfo:
select *,1 AS ID from
( select distinct B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID, B.HUMIDITY,B.TEMPERATURE,B.WINDSPEED AS WIND_VELOCITY,B.PRESSURE,B.RAIN,0 as CLOUD,B.WIND_DIRECTION,B.CREATETIME,B.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,B.WIND_DIR_RESULT,X AS LATITUDE,Y AS LONGITUDE,CITY,b.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,a.name from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}')
ROOT.GetPartitionsHistoryWeatherInfo_bak20210: select distinct B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID, B.ID, B.HUMIDITY,B.TEMPERATURE,B.WINDSPEED AS WIND_VELOCITY,B.PRESSURE,B.RAIN,B.CLOUD,B.WIND_DIRECTION,B.CREATETIME,B.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,B.WIND_DIR_RESULT,X AS LATITUDE,Y AS LONGITUDE,CITY from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}'
ROOT.GetPartitionsHistoryWeatherInfo_new: select B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID，B.ID,B.WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,B.CREATETIME,B.WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,B.WINDSEEP,B.WIND_DIRECTION,B.RAIN,B.TEMPERATURE,X,Y from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO B left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_SOURCE_INFO A on A.ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}'
ROOT.GetStationWeatherHistoryAllInfo: select * from (select S.STATION_ID,W.*,st.longitude,st.latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE S LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO W on W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=S.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b st on st.id=s.station_id WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}') top 4000
ROOT.GetWeatherRainLineInfo: select * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_RAIN_LINE WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}' AND MAXWEATHERVALUE > 0
ROOT.GetRealWeatherRainLineInfo: select * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_WEATHER_RAIN_LINE WHERE CREATETIME = '{0}' AND MAXWEATHERVALUE > 0
